verses.verse: O come <S%H3212><s%>, let us sing <S%H7442><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%>: let us make a joyful noise <S%H7321><s%> to the rock <S%H6697><s%> of our salvation <S%H3468><s%>.
Let us come <S%H6923><s%> before his presence <S%H6440><s%> with thanksgiving <S%H8426><s%>, and make a joyful noise <S%H7321><s%> unto him with psalms <S%H2158><s%>.
For the LORD <S%H3068><s%> is a great <S%H1419><s%> God <S%H410><s%>, and a great <S%H1419><s%> King <S%H4428><s%> above all gods <S%H430><s%>.
In his hand <S%H3027><s%> are the deep places <S%H4278><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>: the strength <S%H8443><s%> of the hills <S%H2022><s%> is his also.
The sea <S%H3220><s%> is his, and he made <S%H6213><s%> it: and his hands <S%H3027><s%> formed <S%H3335><s%> the dry <S%H3006><s%> land.
O come <S%H935><s%>, let us worship <S%H7812><s%> and bow down <S%H3766><s%>: let us kneel <S%H1288><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> our maker <S%H6213><s%>.

For he is our God <S%H430><s%>; and we are the people <S%H5971><s%> of his pasture <S%H4830><s%>, and the sheep <S%H6629><s%> of his hand <S%H3027><s%>. To day <S%H3117><s%> if ye will hear <S%H8085><s%> his voice <S%H6963><s%>,
Harden <S%H7185><s%> not your heart <S%H3824><s%>, as in the provocation <S%H4808><s%>, and as in the day <S%H3117><s%> of temptation <S%H4531><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>:
When your fathers <S%H1><s%> tempted <S%H5254><s%> me, proved <S%H974><s%> me, and saw <S%H7200><s%> my work <S%H6467><s%>.

Forty <S%H705><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> long was I grieved <S%H6962><s%> with this generation <S%H1755><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, It is a people <S%H5971><s%> that do err <S%H8582><s%> in their heart <S%H3824><s%>, and they have not known <S%H3045><s%> my ways <S%H1870><s%>:
Unto whom I sware <S%H7650><s%> in my wrath <S%H639><s%> that they should not enter <S%H935><s%> into my rest <S%H4496><s%>.
